title: Part One: Jerry Falwell: Founder of the Religious Right
itunes:title: Part One: Jerry Falwell: Founder of the Religious Right
description:
In Episode 99, Robert is joined by Sofiya Alexandra to discuss Jerry Falwell.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. 200 Liberty students attend protest after new Falwell revelations
  2. Christian activist group demands criminal probe of Jerry Falwell Jr.
  3. Exclusive: Falwell blasted Liberty student as 'retarded,' police chief as 'half-wit' in emails
  4. Tax Return
  5. Falwell Refutes Allegations Michael Cohen Stopped “Racy” Photos From Leaking
  6. How Liberty University Built a Billion-Dollar Empire Online
  7. Inside Liberty University's 'culture of fear'
  8. President of Liberty University
  9. Falwell: blame abortionists, feminists and gays
  10. Larry Flynt: My friend, Jerry Falwell
  11. Larry Flynt: The trouble with Larry
  12. Jerry Falwell, the Rise of the Moral Majority, and the 1980 Election
  13. The Social Impact Of AIDS In The United States.
  14. The Real Origins of the Religious Right
  15. God's Right Hand: How Jerry Falwell Made God a Republican and Baptized the American Right

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
